item.title: Route 53 Resolver: NXDOMAIN|SERVFAIL
item.description: What we have: On premises data center with own domain zone (domain.local) and dns servers AWS VPC with it’s own domain zone (domain.r53) and using Route 53 as DNS Server What we need: Ability to resolve domain zone hosted on premises DNS Servers from AWS VPC graph LR A[EC2 Instance] -->|a.domain.local| B[Route 53 Forward] -->|a.domain.local| C[DNS On Premises] The configuration is straightforward and well described in official documentation. You simply create rules:
